reviews.review:
Just seen avengers and all I can say is "Wow", thumbs up to the writers and director. They did an outstanding job of combining the stories from all the other Marvel's films into this epic film. I was captivated thru out this whole film.

All I ask is that when part two comes out there are no previews released, no information released. Right now everyone who walked out is probable stones and letting their imagination running g wild.  That alone will drag everyone  back to see the second part.
Absolute classic. Best movie of 2018 nothing will come close.

Its epic movie ever I recommend for everyone
I won't spoil #InfinityWar
Excellent movie, Thanos is one of the best Villains in the MCU, very well told. None of the main heroes came short.

Solo Marvel era capaz de hacer una película tan excelente. Los fanáticos de Marvel sabemos lo difícil que podría resultar hacer una película con tantos superhéroes y lograr encajar cada detalle de todas las historias que hemos visto, pero lo lograron. Preparen sus nervios porque es una mezcla de emociones lo que se vive en esta movie.
Thanos was amazing. This film was fantastic

This movie went above and beyond what expectations I had going in. It was funny, yet emotional and serious at the same time. It takes itself more serious than any other MCU movie they have made, which is to be expected considering the magnitude of the situation they're facing; Thanos and the Infinity Stones. The only problem I have with it is having to constantly switch from one character to another, but considering they have over 30 different main characters they do an excellent job with what they have. It's a movie that goes to the right lengths, and it accomplishes everything and more for me.

It's so easy when you have runaway hype to go into a movie expecting more. This isn't Avengers 3 - it's sequel 19. This is a climax to 10 years of storytelling, it relies on that knowledge. Critics want it to slow down to savour emotional plot points, but it doesn't have to at all. I GET some of the criticisms (they are small) and obviously no film is 100% perfect. Thanos was deep.

Overcome. A lot to digest. Holy hell. 

Perfectly balanced ensemble piece that took serious risks and was very unexpected. Well paced - FAST paced. This was for the fans and its great. Wonderful film making.
Packed with action, surprises and romance. One of the best action movie. But the only problem is in the last it keeps the audience hanging.
